name: Melonaid

ingredients.name: melon, such as honeydew or cantaloupe

preparation: Pour 4 cups boiling water over tea bags. Steep for 10 min. Remove tea bags and chill in refrigerator until cold, about 30 min.
Combine tea, melon, lime juice, and maple syrup in a blender. Blend until slushy. Serve from pitcher.
Pour over ice in a tall glass. Top with sparkling water, as desired.
